content: I need to run some Bash commands from a PHP file using something like exec(). This works fine, except that the commands are run as the www-data user. This causes issues with permissions/access. I'm specifically trying to download modules with b and also git clone a repo. The files are downloaded and assigned to the www-data owner, and the git clone doesn't work because it's not using my account/SSH key. I've read something about allowing the www-data user to sudo to me (without a password), and then only allowing specific commands, but I'm wondering if there are other solutions...?

I use the laravel/envoy task runner for things like this; it can operate on multiple servers including the localhost; here is an example: https://github.com/aturnintime/howtobackdrop.com/blob/master/Envoy.blade.php
